issues.shortMessage: Make the enclosing method "static" or remove this set.
issues.fullMessage: Correctly updating a "static" field from a non-static method is tricky to get right and could easily lead to bugs if there are multiple class instances and/or multiple threads in play.

properties.title: Instance members should not write to "static" fields
